intent_atoms.description: Future developers can understand and apply FoundationUI integration patterns without reverse-engineering code.
Phase 1 implementation of Foundation components (Badges, Cards, Key-Value Rows) proceeds with clear examples and guidelines.
Documentation includes a "FoundationUI Integration" section in Technical Spec and README.
Technical Spec contains 4 detailed code examples for Badge, Card, KeyValueRow, and complex composition.
Design token usage guidelines cover spacing, color, typography, animation tokens with correct/incorrect examples.
Do's and Don'ts list includes 13 guidelines with code examples and rationale.
Integration checklist has 19 verification points covering design tokens, component integration, testing, accessibility, platform compatibility, documentation, build quality gates.
README feature matrix updated to highlight FoundationUI usage and cross-references to Technical Spec.
Package layout includes Examples/ComponentTestApp and Tests/ISOInspectorAppTests/FoundationUI directories.
ComponentTestApp running instructions added with Tuist workflow guidance.
All design tokens must be used exclusively; no magic numbers or hardcoded values in business logic.
FoundationUI types cannot be exposed in business logic layers.
Wrapper components (e.g., BoxStatusBadgeView, BoxMetadataCard) will represent domain semantics and compose with FoundationUI components.
Component composition patterns will follow multi‑component composition for complex UIs.
Accessibility compliance must be WCAG 2.1 AA compliant across all UI components.

functional_units.name: Badge Integration Wrapper
functional_units.description: Component that maps domain ParseStatus to UI BadgeLevel and displays in tree view with accessibility labels

functional_units.name: Card Integration Wrapper
functional_units.description: Wrapper for BoxMetadataCard providing elevation control, design token styling, and nested composition for detail panels

functional_units.name: KeyValueRow Integration Wrapper
functional_units.description: BoxMetadataRow component with copyable text, HexOffsetRow specialization, supporting horizontal/vertical layouts and monospaced fonts

functional_units.name: Complex Composition Example
functional_units.description: Multi-component panel combining Badge, Card, KeyValueRow, SectionHeader, semantic validation counters, and dark mode support

functional_units.name: Design Token Usage Guidelines
functional_units.description: Reference for spacing, color, typography, animation tokens with correct usage examples

functional_units.name: Do's and Don'ts Checklist
functional_units.description: 13 guidelines for wrapping FoundationUI components, using design tokens, testing, accessibility, platform adaptation, documentation, etc.

functional_units.name: Integration Checklist
functional_units.description: 19-point verification list covering token usage, component integration, testing, accessibility, platform compatibility, documentation, build quality gates

functional_units.name: ComponentTestApp Showcase
functional_units.description: Interactive app demonstrating FoundationUI components and integration patterns

functional_units.name: FoundationUI Integration Section in README
functional_units.description: Documentation section with quick links, key features, running instructions for ComponentTestApp

functional_units.name: Technical Spec Integration Documentation
functional_units.description: Detailed technical spec section covering architecture patterns, code examples, design token usage, guidelines, and checklist
